item.title: Minnesota reports 13 more measles cases, raising 2025 total to 18
item.description: Thirteen measles cases have been identified over the past week in Minnesota, including a cluster of 10 cases in Dakota County and three separate cases...

item.title: A healthier lifestyle after bowel screening shown to prevent bowel cancer
item.description: If you adopt a healthier lifestyle after bowel screening, it can lower your risk of both bowel cancer and other chronic diseases, a new study shows.

item.title: FDA authorizes Essilor Stellest eyeglass lenses for children with myopia
